Title: I Am A Storm
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Sheila Callaghan, Dominique Morisseau (executive story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Out of rehab, Lip ponders his next move. Ian is adjusting to his new career and new prospects. Debbie is "daydreaming". Carl is more determined than ever. Fiona just keeps running in place. Frank's shelter rules are debilitating.
